nodes.text: Nur was a water moon located in the Mustafar system of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was home of the heavily secured underwater Fortress Inquisitorius. During the Imperial Era, it was used as the new headquarters of the Inquisitorius and to contain captured Jedi. The moon and fortress were eventually infiltrated by Jedi Knight Cal Kestis and Cere Junda, who were attempting to take back a holocron stolen by the Second Sister.
